thread.title: WATCH: Falcao makes up for missed PK with short-range chip shot
thread.title_full: WATCH: Falcao makes up for missed PK with short-range chip shot

title: WATCH: Falcao makes up for missed PK with short-range chip shot
text:
0 Feb 21, 2017 4:16:02 PM The Monaco star was all over the place Tuesday in the UCL, scoring early on, missing badly from the spot and then giving his team the lead. 
Just like his career, Monaco forward Radamel Falcao had his ups and downs against Manchester City on Tuesday in the Champions League. 
Falcao scored in the 32nd minute to cancel out Raheem Sterling's opener, but he couldn't convert from the penalty spot early in the second half. Then he managed to give his side a 3-2 lead with a beautiful chip shot over goalkeeper Willy Caballero. Remember when Falcao was really, really good? Yeah, that Falcao is back. What. A. Goal. #UCL #MCIASM https://t.co/kBe23GeVnk â€” FOX Soccer (@FOXSoccer) February 21, 2017 
Man City went on to tie the game 3-3 thanks to Sergio Aguero, who scored twice in the second half. Related
